entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a young wizard.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend and companion of Harry's, also a young witch.

entities.name: phineas nigellus
entities.description: The subject of Hermione's portrait, an old wizard.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who is deceased at this point in the story.

entities.name: horcruxes
entities.description: Objects that contain pieces of Voldemort's soul.

relationships.description: Dumbledore did not tell Harry about the sword's true nature.
Hermione is holding a portrait of Phineas Nigellus.
